Wavelength.title: Wavelength
Wavelength.description: The wavelength of the beam, Angstroms

Energy.title: Energy
Energy.description: The energy of the beam, keV

BeamCentreX.title: Beam Centre X
BeamCentreX.description: The beam centre x-axis value, mm

BeamCentreY.title: Beam Centre Y
BeamCentreY.description: The beam centre y-axis value, mm

SampleDetectorDistance.title: Sample to Detector Distance
SampleDetectorDistance.description: The distance of the sample from the detector, mm

Detector.title: Detector
Detector.description: The detector used for the scan

Flux.title: Flux
Flux.description: The flux of the beam, photons per second

DefaultExposureTemperature.title: Default Exposure Temperature
DefaultExposureTemperature.description: The defult exposure temperature, C. Used unless specified per sample.

BeamSizeAtSample.title: Beam Size at Sample
BeamSizeAtSample.description: The size of the beam at the sample

BeamSizeAtDetector.title: Beam Size at Detector (focus)
BeamSizeAtDetector.description: The size of the beam at the detector

RealI0.title: Real I(0)
RealI0.description: Real space value of zero-angle scattering

RealI0Error.title: Real I(0) Error
RealI0Error.description: Error (+-) of the real space value of zero-angle scattering

ReciprocalI0.title: Reciprocal I(0)
ReciprocalI0.description: Reciprocal space value of zero-angle scattering

ReciprocalI0Error.title: Reciprocal I(0) Error
ReciprocalI0Error.description: Error (+-) of the reciprocal space value of zero-angle scattering

RealI0.title: Real Rg
RealI0.description: Real space value of the radius of gyration

RealI0Error.title: Real Rg Error
RealI0Error.description: Error (+-) of the real space value of the radius of gyration

ReciprocalI0.title: Reciprocal Rg
ReciprocalI0.description: Reciprocal space value of the radius of gyration

ReciprocalI0Error.title: Reciprocal Rg Error
ReciprocalI0Error.description: Error (+-) of the reciprocal space value of the radius of gyration

PorodExponent.title: Porod Exponent
PorodExponent.description: The Porod exponent for the scan

Dmax.title: Dmax
Dmax.description: The maximum dimension of the particle, Angstroms

ResolutionLimitQMax.title: Resolution Limit, qmax
ResolutionLimitQMax.description: The resolution limit of the scan, per Angstrom

ResolutionLimitDSpacing.title: Resolution Limit d-spacing
ResolutionLimitDSpacing.description: The smallest discernable distance in the sample, Angstroms
